医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
老年人的资源正在不断扩大69 岁的杰夫·克罗姆雷 (Jeff Kromrey) 将在女儿下次来访时与她坐下来，向她展示如果他遇到意外的健康危机如何访问他的在线帐户。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Resources-are-expanding-for-older-adults-on-their-own.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Resources-are-expanding-for-older-adults-on-their-own.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b3656d3-8ac7-4167-ac50-e2698bda9e60 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 07:28:18 -0500 Resources are expanding for older adults on their own
加州官员退休后领导陷入困境的心理健康委员会加州资深公务员威尔·莱特伯恩 (Will Lightbourne) 接任该州心理健康委员会临时执行主任，此前该委员会的前任执行主任因利益冲突指控而辞职。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/California-official-comes-out-of-retirement-to-lead-troubled-mental-health-commission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/California-official-comes-out-of-retirement-to-lead-troubled-mental-health-commission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a6bb017-5d18-4250-b9e6-d4d8fd30e8c2 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 07:26:58 -0500 California official comes out of retirement to lead troubled mental health commission
HIIT 的代谢益处能否持续？新研究探讨运动后糖尿病的可持续性研究人员调查了长时间停止训练后，高强度间歇训练引起的代谢益处是否持续或有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Can-HIITs-metabolic-benefits-last-New-study-explores-post-exercise-sustainability-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Can-HIITs-metabolic-benefits-last-New-study-explores-post-exercise-sustainability-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b733dae5-b30d-4725-b26b-d45e7df5b2c9 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:48:00 -0500 Can HIIT's metabolic benefits last? New study explores post-exercise sustainability in diabetes
工程免疫细胞可以改变自身免疫性疾病的治疗旨在舒缓的免疫细胞可以改善器官移植、1 型糖尿病和其他自身免疫性疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Engineered-immune-cells-could-transform-treatment-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Engineered-immune-cells-could-transform-treatment-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5a60d51-299a-43b8-b1c9-d5fa9966e8d7 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:04:16 -0500 Engineered immune cells could transform treatment for autoimmune diseases
早期双侧卵巢切除术与阿尔茨海默病风险增加有关早期双侧卵巢切除术的女性面临更高的阿尔茨海默病风险，尤其是携带 APOE4 等位基因的女性；教育和激素治疗可以提供恢复力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Early-bilingual-oophorelection-linked-to-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Early-bilingual-oophorelection-linked-to-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b97b8d9b-cac5-44bc-afda-e16f68815c90 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Early bilateral oophorectomy linked to increased Alzheimer's disease risk
开发气候适应型作物对于全球粮食安全至关重要气候变化引起的日益炎热、干旱、洪水和盐碱化正在减少我们主要农作物生产的食用粮食的数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Developing-climate-resilient-crops-is-essential-for-global-food-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Developing-climate-resilient-crops-is-essential-for-global-food-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2148fca-0e17-4da0-b801-0b8a7e27259a Mon, 09 Dec 2024 05:52:44 -0500 Developing climate-resilient crops is essential for global food security
研究：关闭表现不佳的医院可能会加剧农村地区的健康不平等萨里大学的最新研究表明，关闭绩效不佳的医院可能弊大于利，尤其是在农村地区，无论其绩效状况如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-Closing-underperforming-hospitals-may-exacerbate-health-inequalities-in-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-Closing-underperforming-hospitals-may-exacerbate-health-inequalities-in-rural-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649115e1-837e-4f1a-b669-9e39ab117e12 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 05:46:05 -0500 Study: Closing underperforming hospitals may exacerbate health inequalities in rural areas
牛 H5N1 流感显示出通过关键突变适应人类的潜力最近的研究揭示了 H5N1 突变增强了人类受体结合，强调了大流行风险以及对流感毒株进行警惕监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Bovine-H5N1-influenza-shows-潜在-for-人类-适应-through-key-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Bovine-H5N1-influenza-shows-potential-for- human-adaptation-through-key-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61ec189f-861f-44b6-963b-aa2d7e90bc0f Mon, 09 Dec 2024 05:26:00 -0500 Bovine H5N1 influenza shows potential for human adaptation through key mutations
手写可以增强对学习至关重要的大脑功能手写激活了记忆和学习的关键大脑区域，这表明教育系统应该有效地整合传统和数字方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Writing-by-hand-enhances-brain-function-ritic-for-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Writing-by-hand-enhances-brain-function-ritic-for-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83a0175f-da11-4754-a4d4-529933e1d2eb Mon, 09 Dec 2024 04:58:00 -0500 Writing by hand enhances brain function critical for learning
Newcells Biotech 从投资者那里筹集了额外资金Newcells Biotech（“Newcells”）是一家领先的药物发现合作伙伴，专注于开发体外模型和定制化验服务，以改善人体体内结果的预测，今天宣布已从现有投资者 Mercia Ventures 处进一步筹集 120 万英镑、Northstar Ventures 和 North East Finance。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241208/Newcells-Biotech-raises-additional-funding-from-investors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241208/Newcells-Biotech-raises-additional-funding-from-investors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89eac353-9c4b-4e99-b7e0-69795740e7be Sun, 08 Dec 2024 23:19:00 -0500 Newcells Biotech raises additional funding from investors
